li.article: There are many things that make West Central schools great . Click here to see just a few.

span.a: Click here for a message from the Public Health Department.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; font-size: 14px;
p.span:
In compliance with the order from Indiana Governor Eric Holcomb, West Central Schools will remain closed for the remainder of the school year. West Central staff will continue to serve the community's needs in the following ways.
West Central will use waiver days or planned days off for Mondays and Fridays. We will conduct eLearning days every Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday. This pattern will continue through May 20, 2020.
Student work will be dropped off as arranged with your bus driver every Monday. For non-bus riders, the work can be picked up at the Elementary School at Door C as arranged or on Mondays and Fridays from 1:00pm-6:00pm.

span.span: “Encourage Every Student, Every Day” • Engage - Empower - Educate
West Central High School is an Indiana Four Star School

Congratulations to West Central High School for achieving Four Star status by the Indiana Department of Education!
Non-Discrimination Statement:
Educational services, programs, instruction, and facilities will not be denied to anyone in the West Central School Corporation
as the result of his or age, race, color, national origin, sex, or handicapped condition.
